customer_reviews.title: This stuff is da nomb
customer_reviews.text: Omg!!!! This product has saved my face in less than 24 hours! I am a 53 year old gal who has been using Retin A for 3 years now. My skin always looks great with the exception of when Winter comes. The bitter cold makes my face red, peeling, flakey and dry. It looks awful! I have used every serum and moisturizer known to man to fix my skin and nothing has worked until I got my Clarins Santal Face Oil yesterday. My face is already looking and feeling better. What a fabulous product. Thank you Clarins and thank you AMZN!°
customer_reviews.author: Murray C. Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizing oil, but the scent isn't for me
customer_reviews.text: Like the other Clarins fact treatment oils, this works very well to moisturize your skin, but I just don't like the smell of it. I ordered the Santa, Lotus and Blue Orchid formulas to try each of them. For me, the Blue Orchid scent is much better, so I will use that one in the future. But apart from the scent, this oil is very, very good.
customer_reviews.author: TraJay

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious Oil for Dry Skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil. It’s for dry skin, and really does a great job. Some say the smell is offensive, but, it doesn’t last long, and I actually like it. I’ve tried others, but, this one works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Kennemer

customer_reviews.title: As always, Clarins face oil is a great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely dry skin and at age 62, I need all the help I can get. This oil is very comforting and assists replenish the essential oils in my skin immediately after exfoliating. I also use it under Renergie Night Cream when I need an extra boost to give my skin a glow. I've been told I look years younger and have been using Clarins' products for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon1928

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: It's been wonderful on my extremely dry skin. Absorbs great, not too greasy, wonderful scent and it hasn't made me break out Also, strange as it may sound, I have been using it on my cat. She has an auto immune problem which makes her skin very dry and when she's in a flare up she scratches until it bleeds. She then loses her fur and whiskers. Last flare up I put a few drops on and it helped a lot. Human and kitty approved.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Great for extremely dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and a little goes a long way. I would highly recommend this to anyone with extremely dry skin
customer_reviews.author: LCK

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I've ever put on my skin
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years. Don't be put off buy the price. You get what you pay for. And what you get here is worth every penny. Also, it will last a very very long time, since a few drops are all you need per application. Moisturizes all skin types, soothes, smooths..... my skin just drinks this up. It's not something that will lay on top and leave you greasy. It is easily absorbed.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Fake product. Buyers beware!
customer_reviews.text: I don't write a lot of reviews but wanted to warm users not to purchase from this seller. The item I received is not the real deal. The oil is clear, not yellow and smells like cheap olive oil. I've used Clarins oils for years. Find a reputable seller.
customer_reviews.author: >>Critic's Corner<<<

customer_reviews.title: Great oil
customer_reviews.text: Love the oil. I have very sensitive skin. Since I use the oil, my skin is much better (not as red as it used to be). Some people may not like the smell, but it is fine for me. I will continue use it.
customer_reviews.author: F. Yue

customer_reviews.title: Face it, you will love it
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff for the face. Especially, in winter when skin is dry this helps relieve dryness, and redness without feeling oily. For me, who can't tolerate heavy perfume smells, the smell is natural and great
